snippet: President Obama rejected growing arguments that the chaos in Iraq should prompt him to reconsider his timetable for withdrawing the last soldiers from Afghanistan by the end of 2016.
abstract: Diplomatic Memo; Pres Obama has told advisers that delaying pullout of American troops from Afghanistan will make no difference if country cannot overcome its political rifts; Obama is rejecting chorus of arguments that chaos in Iraq should prompt him to reconsider timetable for withdrawing last troops from Afghanistan.
lead_paragraph: President Obama rejected growing arguments that the chaos in Iraq should prompt him to reconsider his timetable for withdrawing the last soldiers from Afghanistan by the end of 2016.

headline.main: Obama Holds to Afghanistan Withdrawal Deadline
headline.print_headline: Obama Holds to Afghanistan Withdrawal Deadline
